value:
Being away from home has allowed
me to focus purely on the lance, that
I might best defend the ones I love.

My fiancé was an honest and faithful
knight. Pained as I was to lose Glenn,
I'm proud he did his duty to the end.

A clean space makes for a clean
mind, and that starts with what you
wear. Straighten out those cuffs!

Meat, veggies, fish... Char-broiled,
seared, smoked... So many choices.
What should I eat today?

I must study intensely now so that
my skills in riding and the sword and
lance will be ready when called upon.

Greetings. I am here to deliver warm
regards to $Nu
from $Nf.

My aim is to become a devoted
knight—one who could have stood
proudly by Glenn's side.
Ah, no big deal.

Spare me the consolation! I will
do better next time.

Thank you for this. I promise I will
see it put to good use.

I may still be in training, but so long
as brave and determined knights are
needed, I will gladly answer the call.

I find myself wondering, perhaps
counterproductively, what place a
knight has in a world free of conflict.$k$pThat world is His Highness's goal, I
know, but what good is a knight who
is not fighting to protect her people?$k$pHouse Galatea's lands are barren, its
coffers bare. Until I was born, we had
not seen a Crest for generations.$k$pEver since we lost Glenn, my father
has rushed to arrange one marriage
proposal after another for me.$k$pHe means well. He wants what's best
for me and for our house. He has
already sacrificed so much...$k$pAh, forgive me—I have a lot on my
mind. I'm not sure exactly what I'm
trying to say right now.$k$pPerhaps I'm simply grateful to fight
to protect you...as a knight should.
(exertion)
Nice try!
(exertion)
Not bad...
You're finished!
Defenseless are we?
Try this on for size!
This'll do the trick.
Glenn...
*sigh*
I am Ingrid Brandl Galatea. Pleasure to make your acquaintance.
A civilized conversation isn't too much to ask for, is it?
Since I was young, I've always wanted to be strong enough to protect our kingdom, like Prince Dimitri—or Glenn.
My father was never pleased when I'd steal away on my horse...
Some say I could do more to maintain my appearance, but I take little interest in fashion.
All this training has given me a rapacious appetite.
Perhaps we could dine together sometime. I'd be curious to try some of your favorite foods.
Ready when you are.
I'll do my best.
Swiftly.
